name: Out of space for errors of the past
name_original: Out of space for errors of the past
description:
··· CONTROLS ··· 

  • keyboard
    •  arrows to move
    • mouse to aim
    • space or click to fire
    • tab change view
    • R to restart when dead
    • ESC to exit game
  • gamepad
    • left control to move
    • right control to aim
    • face (A) button to fire
    • start to exit
    • select to restart
    • Y to change view

··· TECH ···

Using Unreal 5 Early Access 2 (yes , lot of crashes while editing - not-playing- :):

- Nanite for meshes
- Chaos for destruction
- Lumen for the global illumination 

··· CREDS ···

Tanks and chopter from Vigilante, scenario from Epic.

Game by me. 

Sounds: freesound.org

Music: Fortunate son
